headline.print_headline: Capitals Waive Laich as Trade Deadline Nears
headline.main: Capitals Waive Brooks Laich as Trade Deadline Nears

snippet: The Washington Capitals placed the struggling forward Brooks Laich on waivers, a move that gives the N.H.L.’s top team some potential flexibility.
lead_paragraph: The Washington Capitals placed the struggling forward Brooks Laich on waivers, a move that gives the N.H.L.’s top team some potential flexibility.
